verses.verse: Bow down <S%H5186><s%> your ear <S%H241><s%>, O Lord <S%H3068><s%>, hear <S%H6030><s%> me <S%H6041><s%>: for I am poor and needy <S%H34><s%>.
Preserve <S%H8104><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%>; for I am holy <S%H2623><s%>: O you my God <S%H430><s%>, save <S%H3467><s%> your servant <S%H5650><s%> that trusts in you <S%H982><s%>.
Be merciful <S%H2603><s%> unto me <S%H136><s%>, O Lord: for I cry <S%H7121><s%> unto you daily <S%H3117><s%>.
Rejoice <S%H8055><s%> the soul <S%H5315><s%> of your servant <S%H5650><s%>: for unto you <S%H136><s%>, O Lord, do I lift up <S%H5375><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%>.
For you <S%H136><s%>, Lord, are good <S%H2896><s%>, and ready to forgive <S%H5546><s%>; and plentiful <S%H7227><s%> in mercy <S%H2617><s%> unto all them that call upon you <S%H7121><s%>.
Give ear <S%H238><s%>, O Lord <S%H3068><s%>, unto my prayer <S%H8605><s%>; and attend <S%H7181><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my supplications <S%H8469><s%>.
In the day <S%H3117><s%> of my trouble <S%H6869><s%> I will call <S%H7121><s%> upon you <S%H6030><s%>: for you will answer me.
Among the gods <S%H430><s%> there is none like unto you <S%H136><s%>, O Lord; neither are there any works like unto your works <S%H4639><s%>.

All nations <S%H1471><s%> whom you have made <S%H6213><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> and worship <S%H7812><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H136><s%>, O Lord; and shall glorify <S%H3513><s%> your name <S%H8034><s%>.
For you are great <S%H1419><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> wondrous things <S%H6381><s%>: you are God alone <S%H430><s%>.

Teach <S%H3384><s%> me your way <S%H1870><s%>, O Lord <S%H3068><s%>; I will walk <S%H1980><s%> in your truth <S%H571><s%>: unite <S%H3161><s%> my heart <S%H3824><s%> to fear <S%H3372><s%> your name <S%H8034><s%>.
I will praise <S%H3034><s%> you <S%H136><s%>, O Lord my God <S%H430><s%>, with all my heart <S%H3824><s%>: and I will glorify <S%H3513><s%> your name <S%H8034><s%> for evermore <S%H5769><s%>.
For great <S%H1419><s%> is your mercy <S%H2617><s%> toward me <S%H5337><s%>: and you have delivered my soul <S%H5315><s%> from the lowest <S%H8482><s%> hell <S%H7585><s%>.

O God <S%H430><s%>, the proud <S%H2086><s%> are risen <S%H6965><s%> against me <S%H5712><s%>, and the assemblies of violent <S%H6184><s%> men have sought <S%H1245><s%> after my soul <S%H5315><s%>; and have not set you before them <S%H7760><s%>.

But you <S%H136><s%>, O Lord, are a God <S%H410><s%> full of compassion <S%H7349><s%>, and gracious <S%H2587><s%>, longsuffering <S%H750><s%>, and plentiful <S%H7227><s%> in mercy <S%H2617><s%> and truth <S%H571><s%>.

O turn <S%H6437><s%> unto me <S%H2603><s%>, and have mercy upon me <S%H5414><s%>; give your strength <S%H5797><s%> unto your servant <S%H5650><s%>, and save <S%H3467><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of your handmaid <S%H519><s%>.

Show <S%H6213><s%> me a token <S%H226><s%> for good <S%H2896><s%>; that they which hate <S%H8130><s%> me may see <S%H7200><s%> it <S%H954><s%>, and be ashamed: because you <S%H3068><s%>, Lord, have helped <S%H5826><s%> me <S%H5162><s%>, and comforted me.
